message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $10000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $9500 for it. I believe this is a fair offer given its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand your pricing strategy. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I appreciate your willingness to pay more, I must respectfully decline. Considering the market conditions and the value the product offers, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial price. I propose a counteroffer of $9000 for the product.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8750 for the product. This price reflects my valuation of the product while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am inclined to suggest a compromise. I propose a counter-counteroffer of $8900 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your budget constraints.
